event: Julian F. Keith ADATC Clinical Orientation

notes: ExamSoft: All students will need to purchase ExamSoft. If you have not already done so, please do it asap! It is purchased through the bookstore here (use your WCU email address if asked for an email) : https://books.wcu.edu/MerchDetail?MerchID=1481790

ATI: Students in 2nd, 3rd, and 4th semester need to purchase ATI. Please do so asap if you haven't already! Instructions were provided in a prior email/announcement. Due date: 8/25/25. A late fee is assessed through ATI if not purchased by the due date.
